ygData.subject: Re: Shadow knight quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Which city is this and what lvl are you? I ll try it.  Also has anyone completed lord Grimrots quest of going to mistmore castle? Trian Soulreaper
ygData.messageBody:
Which city is this and what lvl are you? I'll try it. Also has anyone
completed lord Grimrots
quest of going to mistmore castle?

Trian Soulreaper

>I attempted the Sk quest in wich you must kill groflah steadirt just
>now, and his corpse dissapeared with no
>note! i wouldnt mind attempting it again but now all merchants are
>apprehensive to me(except for the Sk ones) and it would be a pain to do
>this over and over and lose all my faction points. Was anyone successful
>in this quest?
>
>-rufane
>tunare server
